text: Sirhan Bishara Sirhan (born March 19, 1944) is a Palestinian with Jordanian citizenship. He was born in Jerusalem. He shot and killed U.S. Senator Robert F. Kennedy on June 6, 1968. He is serving his life sentence in Pleasant Valley State Prison in Coalinga, California.Sirhan Sirhan profile at TruTV.com On August 30, 2019, Sirhan was stabbed multiple times by another prisoner.TMZ , TMZ.com (August 30, 2019). title: Sirhan Sirhan
